QuestData.Title: Call to Arms!
QuestData.Description: Farshire has a fighting chance now, $n. That's all we could've asked for and you've made it possible.$B$BAll we need now is a rallying point. I'll have my men deliver the weapons to our town hall. Go and ring the town hall bell so any survivors know to rally there.$B$BIt's time to show the Scourge what we're made of.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to the town hall building in Farshire and ring the bell inside of it.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks once again for aiding us, $n. The people of Farshire will always remember you.
